inclusion.criterion: Full-term newborns with jaundice after 3-7 days of birth, total bilirubin in serum or transcutaneous bilirubin is between 100umol/L and 257umol/L
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Gestational age≥37 weeks, birth weight≥2.5Kg, Apgar scores≥8
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: lineal consanguinity are all the native residents from Guangdong or Guangxi
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The enzyme activity of G-6-PD will be detected and collected from all the neonates subjects
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consents of all the neonates subjects are needed
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Neonates with congenital malformation of liver and gallbladder;
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a history of tremors since a year ago, which is consistent with Wilson disease. The laboratory study was significant for low serum caeruloplasmin (0.05 g/l) and raised 24 hour urine copper excretion (120 μg/24 h).
